title: Learning Analytics Pipeline: From Student Activity to Dashboards
tags: Kafka, Snowflake, dbt, Power BI, Education, Analytics Pipeline
content: This project showcases a full end-to-end learning analytics pipeline—from simulating student behavior and streaming real-time data via Kafka, to transforming it with dbt/Snowflake, and visualizing ...

title: About Me
content: Analyst with data scientist skills | Turning messy data into models, insights, and impact

title: How Mueller Competes in the Pasta Category – An NBD-Dirichlet Analysis
content: Analyze brand performance for the Pasta category and employ the Dirichlet model to evaluate purchasing behaviors in the market.

title: Economic Downturn and Child Poverty in New Zealand
content: This project explores how long-term unemployment impacts child poverty across different poverty thresholds in New Zealand, using socio-economic data and correlation analysis.

title: How Pricing and Promotions Drive Sales Growth
content: This study investigates how pricing and promotional strategies, including competitor influence, impact the sales of Herbal Essences using the SCAN*PRO model and store-level scanner data.

title: Psychological Distress and Net Worth: An Econometric Investigation
tags: econometric, SAS, statistical modelling, python, data modelling
content: This study applies OLS-based econometric and statistical modelling in SAS EM to reveal how psychological distress shapes wealth accumulation.

title: Machine Learning Models for Image Recognition
tags: machine learning, data mining, TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn
content: Three models (ANN, OpenCV and CNN) were trained to provide classification predictions for 19 specified celebrities. TensorFlow and scikit-learn for model training and evaluation.

title: Multivariate Analysis of Work-Life Balance Indicators
content: Use of various multivariate analysis techniques to explore factors influencing work-life balance indicators, including PCA(principal component analysis), FA(factor analysis), cluster analysis, corr...
